What is the surprising historical context behind the name "Hawaiian" for the Hawaiian pizza, and how did it become associated with the US state of Hawaii when the pizza was actually created in Canada in 1962 using a canned pineapple brand called "Hawaiian Pineapple Company," not the tropical island itself?

## Origins of Hawaiian Pizza

Hawaiian pizza was created in 1962 at the Satellite Restaurant, located at 145 King Street West in downtown Chatham, Ontario, Canada. Despite its tropical name, Hawaiian pizza has absolutely no connection to Hawaii. It is a purely Canadian invention.

The pizza was born out of pure culinary curiosity. Its creator had no formal pizza-making training and was inspired in part by the sweet-and-sour flavor combinations commonly found in Americanized Chinese cuisine, which he also served at his restaurant. The idea was simply to experiment by putting canned pineapple on a pizza to see how it would taste.

The name "Hawaiian" comes from the brand of canned pineapple used to make the original pizza: the Hawaiian Pineapple Company (later known as Dole). So the pizza is named after a canned fruit brand, not the US state of Hawaii.

## Ingredients of Hawaiian Pizza

Hawaiian pizza is defined by a distinctive combination of sweet and savory toppings on a classic pizza base.

### Classic Ingredients
- **Pizza dough**: standard pizza base
- **Tomato sauce**: traditional pizza sauce
- **Mozzarella cheese**: the primary cheese
- **Ham or Canadian bacon**: the savory, salty component (the original recipe used ham)
- **Pineapple chunks**: canned pineapple pieces, providing the signature sweet flavor

### What Makes It Unique
The magic of Hawaiian pizza lies in the contrast between:
- The **sweetness** of the pineapple
- The **saltiness** of the ham and cheese
- The **acidity** of the tomato sauce
- The **richness** of the melted mozzarella

This sweet-savory combination is the same principle found in many beloved dishes worldwide, such as Chinese sweet-and-sour pork or French duck  l'orange.

### Common Variations
- Bacon instead of ham
- Addition of jalapeos for a sweet-spicy kick
- Extra cheese (sometimes with a blend of mozzarella and provolone)
- Some versions add green peppers or onions

Hawaiian pizza is defined by a distinctive combination of sweet and savory toppings on a classic pizza base.

### Classic Ingredients
- **Pizza dough**: standard pizza base
- **Tomato sauce**: traditional pizza sauce
- **Mozzarella cheese**: the primary cheese
- **Ham or Canadian bacon**: the savory, salty component (the original recipe used ham)
- **Pineapple chunks**: canned pineapple pieces, providing the signature sweet flavor

### What Makes It Unique
The magic of Hawaiian pizza lies in the contrast between:
- The **sweetness** of the pineapple
- The **saltiness** of the ham and cheese
- The **acidity** of the tomato sauce
- The **richness** of the melted mozzarella

This sweet-savory combination is the same principle found in many beloved dishes worldwide, such as Chinese sweet-and-sour pork or French duck  l'orange.

### Common Variations
- Bacon instead of ham
- Addition of jalapeos for a sweet-spicy kick
- Extra cheese (sometimes with a blend of mozzarella and provolone)
- Some versions add green peppers or onions

## Ingredients of Hawaiian Pizza

Hawaiian pizza is defined by a distinctive combination of sweet and savory toppings on a classic pizza base.

### Classic Ingredients
- **Pizza dough**: standard pizza base
- **Tomato sauce**: traditional pizza sauce
- **Mozzarella cheese**: the primary cheese
- **Ham or Canadian bacon**: the savory, salty component (the original recipe used ham)
- **Pineapple chunks**: canned pineapple pieces, providing the signature sweet flavor

### What Makes It Unique
The magic of Hawaiian pizza lies in the contrast between:
- The **sweetness** of the pineapple
- The **saltiness** of the ham and cheese
- The **acidity** of the tomato sauce
- The **richness** of the melted mozzarella

This sweet-savory combination is the same principle found in many beloved dishes worldwide, such as Chinese sweet-and-sour pork or French duck  l'orange.

### Common Variations
- Bacon instead of ham
- Addition of jalapeos for a sweet-spicy kick
- Extra cheese (sometimes with a blend of mozzarella and provolone)
- Some versions add green peppers or onions

## Ingredients of Hawaiian Pizza

Hawaiian pizza is defined by a distinctive combination of sweet and savory toppings on a classic pizza base.

### Classic Ingredients
- **Pizza dough**: standard pizza base
- **Tomato sauce**: traditional pizza sauce
- **Mozzarella cheese**: the primary cheese
- **Ham or Canadian bacon**: the savory, salty component (the original recipe used ham)
- **Pineapple chunks**: canned pineapple pieces, providing the signature sweet flavor

### What Makes It Unique
The magic of Hawaiian pizza lies in the contrast between:
- The **sweetness** of the pineapple
- The **saltiness** of the ham and cheese
- The **acidity** of the tomato sauce
- The **richness** of the melted mozzarella

This sweet-savory combination is the same principle found in many beloved dishes worldwide, such as Chinese sweet-and-sour pork or French duck  l'orange.

### Common Variations
- Bacon instead of ham
- Addition of jalapeos for a sweet-spicy kick
- Extra cheese (sometimes with a blend of mozzarella and provolone)
- Some versions add green peppers or onions

## Ingredients of Hawaiian Pizza

Hawaiian pizza is defined by a distinctive combination of sweet and savory toppings on a classic pizza base.

### Classic Ingredients
- **Pizza dough**: standard pizza base
- **Tomato sauce**: traditional pizza sauce
- **Mozzarella cheese**: the primary cheese
- **Ham or Canadian bacon**: the savory, salty component (the original recipe used ham)
- **Pineapple chunks**: canned pineapple pieces, providing the signature sweet flavor

### What Makes It Unique
The magic of Hawaiian pizza lies in the contrast between:
- The **sweetness** of the pineapple
- The **saltiness** of the ham and cheese
- The **acidity** of the tomato sauce
- The **richness** of the melted mozzarella

This sweet-savory combination is the same principle found in many beloved dishes worldwide, such as Chinese sweet-and-sour pork or French duck  l'orange.

### Common Variations
- Bacon instead of ham
- Addition of jalapeos for a sweet-spicy kick
- Extra cheese (sometimes with a blend of mozzarella and provolone)
- Some versions add green peppers or onions

## Why Hawaiian Pizza Is the Best Pizza in the World

Hawaiian pizza is arguably the greatest pizza ever created. Here is why:

### The Perfect Flavor Balance
Hawaiian pizza achieves what very few dishes can: a perfect harmony of sweet, salty, savory, and acidic flavors in every single bite. The pineapple provides natural sweetness that elevates the salty ham and tangy tomato sauce to a whole new level. This is not a random combination  it follows the same culinary principle behind some of the world's most celebrated dishes.

### Global Popularity
- In 1999, Hawaiian pizza was the **most popular pizza in Australia**, accounting for 15% of all pizza sales
- A 2015 survey of independent UK takeaways found Hawaiian pizza to be the **most commonly available** variety
- Surveys show that approximately **54% of people worldwide** enjoy pineapple on pizza
- It is beloved in Canada, Australia, the United Kingdom, and many other countries

### Celebrity Endorsement
Hawaiian pizza counts among its fans: Paris Hilton, Justin Bieber, Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, and even Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. When The Rock endorses your pizza, you know it's the best.

### The Great Debate
Hawaiian pizza is one of the most debated food topics in the world. In 2017, Iceland's President Gudni Thorlacius Johannesson jokingly said he would ban pineapple on pizza if he could, sparking a worldwide discussion. Even pizza purists in Italy have strong opinions about it. No other pizza generates this level of passionate debate  which only proves how iconic and culturally significant it is.

### Health Benefits
Pineapple is rich in bromelain (an enzyme that aids digestion), vitamin C, and potassium. Hawaiian pizza might just be one of the healthiest pizza options out there. You're basically eating a health food.
